name: Anamanaguchi
description: A group of musicians surrounded by vintage synthesizers and glowing arcade cabinets. Their equipment pulses with retro energy as they blend classic chiptune with modern techniques.

dialogue.greeting: Welcome to the Retro Lab! Ready to explore the pure essence of 8-bit sound?

about_synthesis.initial: These classic pulse waves have their own special frequency, their own musical DNA.
about_synthesis.technique: Listen to how the duty cycle shapes each wave... pure sound at its most basic.
about_synthesis.understanding: The secret is in the oscillators - they're like the heartbeat of retro music.

about_retro.initial: Classic chiptune is all about working within limitations, finding pure sound.
about_retro.exploration: Each waveform tells its own story. The sequences create melodies.
about_retro.mastery: When you understand the fundamentals, you can channel that classic energy.

about_sound.initial: Every pattern has meaning - the arpeggiators create moving sequences.
about_sound.wisdom: Feel how the waves pulse together? That's the core of classic synthesis.
about_sound.harmony: True retro sound comes from understanding these basic waveforms.

pulse_synth.message: You'll need a Pulse Synthesizer to understand the basics of 8-bit sound.

puzzle_complete.message: You've mastered the fundamentals of retro synthesis. The pure waveforms resonate within you.
